about_the_game:
“Reap the swirling foe and restore light to the world!”

This is a "BOUKEN action RPG" that allows you to freely explore the world while defeating countless monsters that come at you.The goal is to defeat the demon king, Lazarus! It is entirely up to the player to decide what path through the open-field world and what kind of experience he or she will have to go through to achieve his or her goal.

■ Flexible character build

Each character will learn six different skills. Some of these skills will be unique to the character, while others can be learned at the player's preference.When a character levels up, he or she can strengthen the skills he or she has acquired or learn new skills.

In towns and villages around the world, you can purchase armor with various buffing effects.Each piece of armor has 1 to 3 buff effects randomly assigned to it, so it is important to equip the right armor for your character's skill set.

■ Exhilarating action with easy operation

The player controls the movement of the character and various skills are automatically activated. The game does not require complicated operations, making it easy to play even for players who are not good at action games.The simple operation provides an exhilarating experience of cleaving countless monsters.

*This makes character building important.

■ Stories for each character

At the start, there are only two characters, but new characters can be released by fulfilling conditions.Each character has his or her own purpose for adventuring in the world besides defeating the Demon King, Lazarus. It is up to the player to experience each story or not.

■ Open field world hides many mysteries

There are various dungeons around the world, including dungeons where powerful enemies lurk and dungeons where Relic lies in wait. In some of these dungeons, there are summoned beasts that can help your character. However, summoned beasts will only lend their powers to those stronger than themselves. Show your strength to the summoned beasts and use their mysterious powers to help you on your adventure.

■ Adventurer's Tips

(1) Whenever you find a town or village, be sure to stop by! (Stopping at a town or village will auto-save your data.)

(2) Be careful when traveling at night! (Monster activity in the field increases at night.)

(3) Never push yourself too hard! Have the courage to turn back! (If you die during the adventure, you will lose all coins and start from the previous saved data)

(4) If you feel that the monsters are strong, review your equipment! (It is important to have protective equipment that will defend you against enemy attacks.)

(5) Be well prepared when adventuring in special terrain! (When walking through deserts and snowfields, you will take damage if you are not resistant.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit) or later
  • Processor: 2GHz or faster processer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "LAZARUS" is a BOUKEN action RPG where you freely explore the world while mowing down countless monsters. Strengthen your character with skills and equipment, and aim to defeat the demon king Lazarus! Various dungeons, summoned beasts with mysterious powers, and relics await players in the world.
